item.name: images_quality
item.label: Image packing quality
item.help: [Image packing quality]||When jpgs are resized or pngs compressed, they are saved in this quality.||If you want to make {Google Page Insights} happy, set it to 85||Otherwise, when there is no problems with page speed, set this to 95.

item.help: [Image 2x size modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for high density (retina) screens

item.help: [Use deprecated features]||Switch on some deprecated features to enable backwards compatibility.

item.label: Repeating tasks trigger
item.help: [visits] - need to run regularly repeating tasks is checked when users visit||[cron] - when server crontab calls /cms_operations/cron/ (preferred, but not always available)
